snippet: Spotify has reported via Twitter that it now has 50 million paid subscribers, a rise of 25 percent in less than six months, and extending the music streaming service's lead over its closest rival, Apple Music....

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

lead_paragraph: Spotify has reported via Twitter that it now has 50 million paid subscribers, a rise of 25 percent in less than six months, and extending the music streaming service's lead over its closest rival, Apple Music.
